name: WrightSock ECO Hike Crew Socks - Unisex
description:
These technical socks are double-layered to reduce friction as you move. Great for hiking and other long days on your feet, they are naturally resistant to odour.Outer layer is made of Repreve® polyester, nylon and Lycra.Repreve® polyester is made from plastic bottles retrieved from waterways.Inner layer is RWool® upcycled wool, nylon and Lycra.Mesh panels provide air flow to keep your feet cool.Stabilizer zone in arches lock socks in place.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}








                      Recycled content
